src:
Berakhir Pekan Depan, Nih Sederet Bocoran Pembaruan di Season 10 PUBG Mobile
04 Nov 2019, 06:59 by Mansur
Bocoran Update Season 10 PUBG Mobile
Oketekno – Tidak berasa kali ini game PUBG Mobile sudah mau berganti season lagi. Sebagaimana informasi yang beredar luas, pada tanggal 7 November 2019 mendatang Season 9 sudah berakhir, dan setelah maintenance selama beberapa jam, game kembali bisa dibuka dengan pembaruan yang cukup beragam.
Dalam season 10 mendatang, sepertinya bakalan ada sederet pembaruan yang berarti. Kalau masalah skin sudah pasti, dikarenakan Tencent Games juga ingin menawarkan opsi permainan lebih berwarna terhadap pemain. Dan mereka yang sudah mendapatkan RP Maksimum, dipastikan mendapat beberapa skin Royale Pass yang ditawarkan juga.

Simak Nih: 

Map Baru PUBG Mobile Erangel 2.0 Hadir Bulan Desember?


Penasaran apa saja sih pembaruan di Season 10 PUBG Mobile mendatang? Berikut ini sebagaimana dikutip dari Mr. Ghost Gaming, dimana ada skin hingga senjata baru yang bakal dihadirkan di season selanjutnya.


Copyright ©YouTube @Mr. Ghost Gaming



Tema


Pada Season 10 dalam game PUBG Mobile mendatang akan mengangkat tema padang pasir. Jadi nantinya untuk skin yang didapatkan juga tidak jauh berbeda dengan gaya berpakaian dan kendaraan gurun, mungkin Buggy yang bakal menjadi ikonik vehicle dalam season 10.


Skin Senjata


Kemudian untuk senjata yang bakal mendapatkan skin yakni M249. Orang-orang biasa memanggilnya dengan Rambo, karena memang senjata tersebut menjadi salah satu yang digemari oleh karakter utama dalam film Rambo series. Bisa jadi skin M249 ini sendiri akan didapatkan juga dari RP.

Baca Juga: 

Tips Penting Ketika Mendarat di Tempat Rame dalam PUBG Mobile Bagi Pemula




Kostum dan Emote Baru


Dalam video yang diunggah oleh Mr. Ghost Gaming ini diketahui ada beberapa kostum yang ditunjukkan, seperti Apocalypse Guardian, Desert Trooper, Assassin of the Dawn, Mechanical Mercenary, dan beberapa lainnya. Kemudian ada emote baru juga yang bikin musuh makin kesel ketika terbunuh.


Senjata Baru (Vikendi)


Sama seperti G36C, senjata baru bernama MP5K ini nantinya akan hadir eksklusif di Vikendi saja. Dan Senjata ini masuk kelas SMG dengan fire rate yang tidak terlalu tinggi seperti Uzi, namun kalau damage yang dihasilkan lebih ngeri.
Benarkah berbagai macam rumor update Season 10 PUBG Mobile yang beredar ini? Kita nantikan saja pembaruan season beberapa hari lagi.
baca juga: Tips Tempur di Open Field dan Last Circle dalam Game PUBG Mobile
text:
Ends Next Week, Here Are the Leaks to Update in PUBG Mobile Season 10
Nov 04 2019, 06:59 by Mansur
PUBG Mobile Season 10 Update
Oketekno - Not feeling this time the PUBG Mobile game is about to change seasons again. As information is widely circulated, on 7 November 2019 the upcoming Season 9 has ended, and after several hours of maintenance, the game can be opened again with quite a variety of updates.
In the upcoming season 10, it looks like there will be a series of meaningful updates. If the skin problem is certain, because Tencent Games also wants to offer more colorful game options to players. And those who have already got the maximum RP, are certain to get some Royale Pass skins offered too.

Listen Here:

New PUBG Mobile Erangel 2.0 Map Comes in December?


Are you curious about the updates in the upcoming Season 10 PUBG Mobile? The following is quoted from Mr. Ghost Gaming, where there are skins up to new weapons that will be presented in the next season.


Copyright © YouTube @Mr. Ghost Gaming



Theme


In Season 10 in the upcoming PUBG Mobile game, the theme will be desert. So later for the skin that is obtained is also not much different from the style of clothing and desert vehicles, maybe Buggy will become an iconic vehicle in season 10.


Weapon Skin


Then for weapons that will get a skin that is M249. People used to call him Rambo, because indeed the weapon became one that is favored by the main characters in the Rambo series. Could be this M249 skin itself will also be obtained from the RP.

Also Read:

Important Tips When Landed in Crowded Places in PUBG Mobile for Beginners




New Costumes and Emotes


In the video uploaded by Mr. Ghost Gaming is known to have shown some costumes, such as the Apocalypse Guardian, Desert Trooper, Assassin of the Dawn, Mechanical Mercenary, and several others. Then there is also a new emote that makes the enemy more upset when killed.


New Weapon (Vikendi)


Just like G36C, this new weapon called MP5K will be present exclusively in Vikendi. And this weapon belongs to the SMG class with a fire rate that is not too high like the Uzi, but if the damage is more horrifying.
Is it true that the various rumors of Season 10 PUBG Mobile updates are circulating? Let's just wait for the season update in a few days.
Also read: Combat Tips in Open Field and Last Circle in the PUBG Mobile Game
